item.description:
Come one, come all!

THIS EVENT IS SPONSORED BY MEETUP MEMBERS HEDWIDGE AND MASHA(http://salsa.meetup.c...

Event details:

NLDC is planning to have their annual Halloween party on October 30th at Ryles. Please stay tuned for details and start coming up with your costume! :)
There will be salsa classes before the party starts, for those who want to learn a move or two. Classes will be on regular schedule:
7:00 PM - 8:15 PM Beginner/Adv Beginner Salsa
8:15 PM - 8:30 PM Free Introductory Class
8:30 PM - 9:30 PM Intermediate/Advanced Salsa

There will be a costume contest with some fabulous prizes (it's a tradition!)

DJ Hernan in the house... don't forget to stop by the DJ corner to give him a hug!

Cover: $13 with classes, $8 after 9.30

This event is also posted on going.com and facebook:
http://babson.faceboo...
http://boston.going.c...

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Noche Latina annual Halloween Party Oct 30!
